text: 5:46 Jenesis 3:15; Godɨn Araziba 18:15-18; Jon 1:45; Aposel 3:22; 26:22Ezɨ akar Moses osiriziba, da nan gun mɨgei. Kamaghɨn, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Mosesɨn akabar ikɨva, egh ia uaghan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan akabar ikiam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Mosesɨn akaba ko nan akabar itir puvatɨ.
